DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether subthalamic deep brain stimulation ( STN DBS ) affect moral economic decision patient Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Subthalamic Deep Brain Stimulation Effects Decision-making Processing Patients With Parkinson 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Sample A group patient idiopathic PD bilateral STN DBS implant ( experimental group ) control group include patient idiopathic PD without DBS implant treat dopaminergic medication recruit IRCCS Fondazione Ca ' Granda Ospedale Maggiore Policlinico Milan Istituto Neurologico Nazionale IRCCS Casimiro Mondino Pavia . Patients select order balance group gender , age , disease duration , cognitive motor function . Decision-making computerized task Moral task . The task consist 38 sentence divide 13 neutral , 10 moral conflictual 15 moral non conflictual statement . Each statement present random order maximum 10 s. During period , participant instruct read sentence respond agree disagreed press `` A '' ( agreement ) `` L '' ( disagreement ) key leave right finger . After key press , black screen display 1 next statement appear screen ( Fumagalli et al. , 2011 ) . Economics task . Pairs stimulus ( four letter Latin alphabet ) present screen white black background . To maximize gain , subject ask choose letter press one two keyboard key , correspond stimulus leave right screen . Each choice prompt two visual feedback , first display money lose second indicating total sum money subject gaining . Each stimulus pair precede black screen . Six different stimulus pair ( AB , AC , AD , BC , BD , CD ) present . Stimulus pair comprise stimuli probability win ( conflictual trial ) different probability win ( non conflictual trial ) . The letter `` A '' `` D '' lead positive feedback ( +60 Euros ) 80 % time negative feedback ( -30 Euros ) 20 % time ( non risky letter ) . `` B '' `` C '' letter lead high positive feedback ( +100 Euros ) 20 % time high negative feedback ( -70 Euros ) 80 % ( risky letter ) . The task design reward non risky choice , large number non risky choice , high amount money earn . The task comprise 102 trial , 68 non conflictual 34 conflictual ( Rosa et al. , 2013 ) . Experimental protocol All patient test moral economics task best ON-drug medication condition . The experimental group perform task STN DBS ON condition STN DBS OFF condition . Following end STN DBS ON session , DBS device turn physician 30 minute prior STN DBS OFF session . The order stimulation condition version task randomize counterbalance . The control group similarly perform moral economics task twice time interval , without STN DBS manipulation . Motor , cognitive psychological assessment . Patients perform short motor , cognitive psychological assessment use UPDRS III , MMSE VASs subjective evaluation mood , anxiety , movement difficulty motor fatigue . VASs perform twice : STN DBS ON OFF condition experimental group , first second session control group . UPDRS III MMSE evaluate patient experimental group STN DBS ON condition control patient first session . Statistical Analysis Normality test perform behavioural data ( reaction time responses computerized task , score obtain MMSE , UPDRS III , VASs ) One-Sample Kolmogorov-Smirnov Test . Behavioural data obtain experimental group STN DBS ON STN DBS OFF condition compare analysis variance ( ANOVA ) . Also data obtain patient experimental group compare data obtain control group .
